General.Name: Agrometal
General.Description: Agrometal S.A.I. manufactures and sells sowing agricultural machinery in Argentina. It provides coarse grain planters comprising TX MEGA Gen 3, TX PIVOT 2, and APX; MXY 2 fine grain planter; ADX Magna multipurpose planter; and MX Max multipurpose planter, as well as double chamber actuator. The company was formerly known as Agrometal S.R.L and changed its name to Agrometal S.A.I. in 1957. The company was incorporated in 1958 and is based in Monte Maíz, Argentina.
